AUTOTRIGGER.HINT: Automatically trigger this transition any time this scene is activated.
AUTOTRIGGER.LABEL: Automatically Trigger

ANIMATIONDELAY.HINT: Time, in milliseconds, to wait before beginning the animation.
ANIMATIONDELAY.LABEL: Animation Delay

ANIMATIONDURATION.HINT: Time, in milliseconds, that it should take for the slide-in animation to play.
ANIMATIONDURATION.LABEL: Animation Duration

BOTCOLOR.HINT: Coor to be used for bottom, tertiary color bar.
BOTCOLOR.LABEL: Bottom Color

FONT.HINT: Font to use for message text.
FONT.LABEL: Font

FONTSHADOW.HINT: Color for the shadow on the main message text.
FONTSHADOW.LABEL: Font Shadow Color

FONTSIZE.HINT: Size of the main message font.
FONTSIZE.LABEL: Font Size

MESSAGE.HINT: If unspecified, will display an actor's name.
MESSAGE.LABEL: Message

MIDCOLOR.HINT: Color to be used for middle, secondary color bar.
MIDCOLOR.LABEL: Middle Color

SUBCOLOR.HINT: Color of the secondary message text.
SUBCOLOR.LABEL: Subtext Color

SUBSHADOW.HINT: Color of the shadow for the secondary message text.
SUBSHADOW.LABEL: Subtext Shadow Color

SUBSIZE.HINT: Size of the secondary message font.
SUBSIZE.LABEL: Subtext Size

SUBTEXT.HINT: Text displayed below the main message.
SUBTEXT.LABEL: Subtext

TOPCOLOR.HINT: Color to be used for top, primary color bar.
TOPCOLOR.LABEL: Top Color

BACKGROUND.HINT: Background color or image to show behind this step
BACKGROUND.LABEL: Background

EASING.HINT: The easing function to use when animating this transition.
EASING.LABEL: Easing

BURNSIZE.HINT: Size of the burn holes during transiton
BURNSIZE.LABEL: Burn Size

INNERRADIUS.HINT: Radius of a circle in the center of the screen that is not blurred.
INNERRADIUS.LABEL: Inner Radius
